name: The Keystone Group
tagline: Results-driven mid-market specialists in manufacturing and distribution turnarounds
description: The Keystone Group is a results-oriented management consulting firm. Our small, experienced teams work with middle-market manufacturing, distribution, and business services clients to develop and execute strategic growth, improve operations, restructure finances, and integrate acquisitions. Our mission is to make a substantive difference in the companies we work with and the lives of the people that work for them. For over thirty years, we have been building long-term relationships with our clients by helping them identify and implement solutions to their most complex business issues.
known_for: Boutique firm specializing in middle-market manufacturing and distribution with deep operational expertise. Ranked #1 by Vault for firm culture (2020-2023) and known for hands-on implementation work, no up-or-out model, and strong work-life balance for consulting.

recruiting.process: Resume → Round 1 (behavioral/fit) → Round 2 (1 case + 1 behavioral) → Round 3 (office visit to Chicago to meet team)
recruiting.unique: Heavy emphasis on cultural fit throughout all rounds. Final round is full-day office visit to assess fit across firm. No digital assessment or group case. Interviews conducted by leadership team.
recruiting.timeline: Fall recruiting at target schools. Offers Consultant Development Program (CDP) - 2-day conference in Chicago for sophomores.

byu.tip: No BYU alumni presence - cold networking required. Firm recruits from Emory, Georgia Tech, Howard, Indiana, and Michigan. Focus on manufacturing/distribution expertise and cultural fit when reaching out.
